org.deeplearning4j.models.embeddings.inmemory

Class InMemoryLookupTable<T extends SequenceElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.models.embeddings.inmemory.InMemoryLookupTable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WeightLookupTable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GloveWeightLookupTable

    public class InMemoryLookupTable<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightLookupTable<T>
    Default word lookup table
